tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255),
  resource_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_learning_resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  resource_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  author_name VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  availability_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE educational_institutions (
  institution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  institution_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  total_students INT,
  contact_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_management (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_id INT,
  institution_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES ar_learning_resources(resource_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES educational_institutions(institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Resource_Availability (
  availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_id INT,
  institution_id INT,
  available_quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES AR_Learning_Resources(resource_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES Institution(institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Resource_Usage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  availability_id INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  usage_duration INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (availability_id) REFERENCES Resource_Availability(availability_id)
);
